2019 Corporate Social Responsibility Report 41
Amalgamated Bank engaged South Pole Carbon Asset Management Ltd. to conduct a carbon inventory of our operations for FY 2019. The GHG accounting covers indirect emissions 
from purchased electricity, heating and cooling (Scope 2) and other indirect emissions (Scope 3).
The GHG accounting and reporting procedure is based on the Greenhouse Gas Protocol: A Corporate Accounting and Reporting Standard Revised Edition  (GHG Protocol), the most widely
